original_text: But now God has made you free from the power of sin. You have become God's slaves. Many good things come from that, because God is helping you to live in a good way. In the end, the result will be that you will live with him for ever.
korean_text: 그러나 이제는 너희가 죄로부터 해방되고 하나님께 종이 되어 거룩함에 이르는 열매를 맺었으니 그 마지막은 영생이라

sentences.original_text: But now God has made you free
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이제 하나님께서 너희를 자유롭게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: Many good things come from that
to live in a good way
In the end, the result will be
that you will live with him for ever
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 그와 영원히 함께 살게 될 것이다
